com.safenetinc.luna.provider.digest
Class LunaDigest

java.lang.Object
  java.security.MessageDigestSpi
      com.safenetinc.luna.provider.digest.LunaDigest
Direct Known Subclasses:
LunaDigestMD2, LunaDigestSHA1, LunaDigestSHA224, LunaDigestSHA256, LunaDigestSHA384, LunaDigestSHA512, LunaDigestSM3
public abstract class LunaDigest
extends MessageDigestSpi

Abstract base class for the Luna provider's message digest engine classes. Digest engines that subclass from LunaDigest run the hash computations on the Luna HSM.

Specified by:
engineUpdate in class MessageDigestSpi
Parameters:
input - The array of bytes to use for the update

len - The number of bytes to use, starting at offset

engineUpdate

protected void engineUpdate(ByteBuffer buff)
Description copied from class: java.security.MessageDigestSpi
Update the digest using the specified ByteBuffer. The digest is updated using the input.remaining() bytes starting at input.position(). Upon return, the buffer's position will be equal to its limit; its limit will not have changed.

Overrides:
engineUpdate in class MessageDigestSpi
Parameters:
buff - the ByteBuffer

engineDigest

protected byte[] engineDigest()
Runs the hash computation on the accumulated data and returns the result in a new byte array. The accumulated data will be cleared after this operation completes.

Specified by:
engineDigest in class MessageDigestSpi
Returns:
The array of bytes for the resulting digest operation

engineDigest

protected int engineDigest(byte[] output,
                           int offset,
                           int len)
                    throws DigestException
Runs the hash computation on the accumulated data and copies the result into the specified buffer. The accumulated data will be cleared after this operation completes.

Overrides:
engineDigest in class MessageDigestSpi
Parameters:
output - The digest is copied into this buffer. A DigestException will be thrown if the buffer from the offset forward is too short to contain the digest output
offset - Offset into the destination buffer
len - The amount of the buffer to use for the digest. A DigestException is thrown if this value is less than the size of the digest
Returns:
The length of the digest stored in the output buffer
Throws:
DigestException - The given output buffer is too small

engineGetDigestLength

protected abstract int engineGetDigestLength()
Returns the digest length in bytes.

Overrides:
engineGetDigestLength in class MessageDigestSpi
Returns:
The digest length, in bytes

clone

public Object clone()
             throws CloneNotSupportedException

a clone if the implementation is cloneable.
